trans-unit.source: Hosts an ActiveX control as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.
Use the ActiveXHost class to host an ActiveX control as a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
Currently, support is limited to windowed controls.
Creates the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> window and assigns it to a parent.
The parent window.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> window.
Destroys the hosted window.
A structure that contains the window handle.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost.Dispose*> method has been called on the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> instance.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> instance has been disposed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the size of the window represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> object, as requested by layout engine operations.
The size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> object.
The size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> object.
Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.
The event data to the access key event.

The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager"></xref> object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.
Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> has been updated.
The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
Overrides <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged*>.
The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
Called when the hosted window's position changes.
The window's position.
